speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: For example, under the agreement, China will be able to increase these emissions by a staggering number of years, 13.
politifact_statement: Trump China "can do whatever they want for 13 years. Not us."
verified_claim: The climate-change agreement between the United States and China "requires the Chinese to do nothing at all for 16 years."
verified_claim_article_title: Mitch McConnell says U.S.-China climate deal means China won't have to do anything for 16 years
